title: Continue Registration
altOneFunder: Select the fields you want to invest your funding in
altOneKickStarter: Select fields you are willing to work in

altTwoLawyer: Input all countries where you are familiar with government procedures and available to work in

altTwoKickStarter: Input all countries where you want to establish your startup in
